lead_paragraph: Here's Stephen Curry's year in a nutshell. A record 402 3-pointers, all 131 MVP first-place votes, and zero doubt.

headline.main: An NBA MVP Vote Is Finally Unanimous, and Steph Stands Alone
headline.print_headline: An NBA MVP Vote Is Finally Unanimous, and Steph Stands Alone
